text.jpText:
『天皇賞（秋）』を終えて……。
サイレンススズカはこの先も走り続けるため、
トレーナーにケガの治療に専念すると告げた。
text.enText:
After "Tennou-sho (Autumn),"…… Silence Suzuka 
told her trainer that she would focus on her 
injury so that she could continue running. 
She told her trainer that she will 
concentrate on the treatment of her injury.

text.jpText:
無理を押してでもレースに出走し続ける
だろうと思っていたトレーナーは、
彼女の考えの変化に驚きを隠せなかった。
text.enText:
The trainer, who had thought she would 
continue to race even if she had to push 
herself, was surprised at the change in her 
thinking. The trainer was surprised at the 
change in her thinking.

text.jpText:
サイレンススズカは、『天皇賞（秋）』の
レースで最後まで走れたのは、トレーナーの
言葉があったからだと、信頼を寄せる。
text.enText:
Silence Suzuka credits her trainer's words 
for her ability to run to the end in the 
"Tennou-sho (Autumn)" race. She credits her 
trainer's words with the reason why she was 
able to run to the end of the race.

text.jpText:
サイレンススズカは、2人で一緒に
先頭の景色を見続けたいとトレーナーに
伝えるのだった。
text.enText:
Silence Suzuka told her trainer that she 
wanted to continue to see the view from the 
front together.
